name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 51 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: Encik Tan used to serve decent chicken chop curry rice, not sure why so lousy now, the curry is watery and tasteless, the vege super nua and not fresh, fried egg also very cin cai, braised sauce is missing. Mee pok still eatable, else I would have rate 1 star like most of the reviewers. I wonder if only this branch, or all other Encik Tan also drop standard now.

name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 52 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: Food is so so I don't expect much. Reasonable price. Front crew only know how to shout  instead of speaking nicely. How rude. I understand can be peak hours sometimes but please its basic courtesy. The male cashier is the friendliest out of the front crew. Also payment methods quite limited to cash and shopee pay. Since u guys have so many outlets why can't you use paynow????

name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 51 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: Visit this branch on Jan 2021. I love Encik Tan food, but give two stars for this branch. The food was ok. Price wise, affordable. I don't expect first class service, but one thing put this branch down specially during covid19 pandemic, the queue system to collect the rice/noodle food doesn't use number like fried delight collection. The staffs just shouting2 the food name for cust to collect. They even forget our order, just say because other cust took our food. No apologize, just excuse. What a disaster.

name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 52 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: Encik Tan at Tampines Hub. The Brother Lim Boon Kheng cooking claypot chicken rice did a fantastic job on the dish. My mom who has a decreased appetite actually finished the claypot chicken rice on her own. She said it was “very good”.

name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 51 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: encik tan outlet with bad service, came to check on my order after awhile but they told me to sit down and wait. turns out they forgot the order. encik tan at vivo makes the food faster even during peak hour. two stars cos the food always slaps

name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 52 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: Superb street food in a food court setting. If you like Chinese styled noodles, this place is for you. They are open till late (maybe even 24 hours) but half the menu is closed late at night. Staff are friendly and all the food are halal.

name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 51 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: Decent food at a decent price. Safest best on the menu is the chicken cutlet. Fish is deep fried and the batter is so thick you won’t know which part of the fish. Avoid fish.

name: Encik Tan - OTH Branch
address: 51 Tampines Ave 4 #01-12, Our Tampines Hub, Singapore 528523
review: Food doesn't taste as fantastic as how others described.The standard has dropped.The price is also a little steep compared to other restaurants nearby.

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: This is my favourite outlet for the Buddy hoagies chain, staffs here were mostly very friendly! Esp, Emily, Bernard etc… they were attentive and approachable.. chili sauce here is always refilled before it runs out and the food are served hot and delicious. Their dessert selection is quite interesting and the price is pretty affordable. Good for family gathering etc. Will definitely be back in the near future. Highly recommend!!

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: Large and spacious. Service was prompt. Came for lunch. Despite the large lunch crowd, starters and drinks were served promptly. Food came 10 minutes after, quite fast. Coleslaw was very fresh. Fish and chips was crispy and tasty. Prices are affordable.

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: I ordered the Seafood platter. The prawns were done nicely. The current weekday lunch promotion adds a soup and a drink to main courses ordered. A trainee by the name of Jia Yin served us and she was simply outstanding at her work. Great service!

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: Very affordable prices and value for money. Double up chicken for only $14.90 and lamb chop for $15. There’s my favourite rosti too. A steal! Comfortable ambience too. Suitable for a quick family dinner or casual meal with friends. Easily accessible.

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: Good choice for budget steak or grilled. Service is good. Staff are friendly and helpful. I think their chicken is better than beef. BTW, good price with reasonable quality. Went for lunch and quite good deal - free drink and soup with a Main ordered. I ordered the Rösti with Chicken and it was actually quite nice! Not too oily with crispy edges. Soup came with halved hotdog bun, toasted on one side, soft on another. Quite family and student friendly place. The staff was attentive, friendly and prompt! I can see they were short handed with the full house, but everyone was efficient and food was served very quickly. Weekday lunch set is very worth it. We forgot to take photos except for this quick picture taken outside their restaurant. Food served was good, kids meal portion was just nice, and once more - great staff made this a very pleasant dining experience.

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: terrible food and service. been visiting for past years but in specific their carbonara pasta’s standard dropped tremendously. watery and sour taste. believe is due to the change in chef and a replacement of the dish doesn’t change the problem. will not come back again.

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: Ordered the seafood platter and added the soft shell crab.  It was SO SALTY! I could barely finish my meal. Disappointed.

name: Buddy Hoagies Cafe & Grill
address: 11 Bedok North Street 1, #01-27 Heartbeat @ Bedok, Singapore 469662
review: Come off day once a week, the food is good, but sometimes it feels like a different person cooks it! Sometimes it's really delicious! I went to eat today off day, I think it’s different today, it’s okay!

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: Have been here couple of times and both times the experience was amazing. Ordered steak and lamb rack. Both the dishes were excellent with steak being of the right temperature and lamb chops being tender and succulent. The Mediterranean sauce on the lamb chops was amazing. The only issue is that it is always pretty full so wait times will be 30 to 40 mins. Plus drinks will arrive much earlier than the food and you will probably finish the drinks before the good arrive, is they can solve for this issue, that will be great.

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: Even though the food may be pricey in the menu, they are extremely value for money and delicious! The portion is enormous even for their apple juice! Very satisfying meal

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: First time coming and pleasant surprised and overwhelmed with the huge variety in the menu that offers BBQ seafood, Asian and Western. It is a halal restaurant. The food are all generally nice.

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: My first time here and I already like the lively atmosphere, especially so now that it's Christmas night. I like how the place just kinda lights up beautifully with the decorations done. I ordered the Roti John and it was a solid 10-15mins before I got it but it is totally worth it

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: Went here for lunch today (1st Jan 22) and to my surprise the waiting time for food to be served went up to an hour given that our order was not more than a fried rice and hor fun - nothing fancy I would say. Not sure if other food patrons experienced the long wait too. Upon approaching the staff to ask status of my food, I was asked to be patient though the wait was already up to an hour and funny how other tables who came and ordered after us received their food first. I’ve been to Spize @ Rifle Range before and hands down they have the best service by far. Cleanliness, professionalism of staff, fairly good waiting time for food to be ready and etc. If there is one or many things Spize Bedok can improve on, I hope the management will try to look at how Spize Rifle Range operates and deliver the same service too.

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: Rather poor service and attitude from the staffs. Food wasn't properly prepared, hor fun texture was like rubber, cheese fries taste sour, fried chicken cutlet was dry like a rock=( the one star was for the coke which was well chilled, wouldn't recommended this place unless you have low or no expectations on food and services.

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: Seems like they care about profits more than anything else. The food quality is not as good as before. Satay gravy is basically water with peanuts. Don't be fooled by the crowds!

name: Spize @ Bedok
address: 338 Bedok Rd, Singapore 469516
review: Pathetic service. Made eye contact, waved, called out politely but no one took our order.  At least 4 staff walked by and entertained other customers in bigger groups right behind us. Very annoyed with their attitude.

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: a very warm n friendly lounge ... where thr bar food is great ... pizzas , pastas and lots more ... a great place to chill n relax...

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: Good vibes with good food. Belongs to the tipsy family and done well. Quiet environment, just downside could be less accessible compared to other outlets.

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: Great ambience, Nice food and an exotic sprit collection. One of the nicest places in and around Changi Area. Awesome place to hangout with buddies after a Football game/Cricket Practise.

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: Always walked past this establishment along Tanjong Katong Road and finally decided to enter and give this place a try. And i wasnt disappointed. Ordered what has become my usual order of two pints of Heineken, Tomato and Mushroom Bruschetta and fries. Go in the late afternoon, early evening when the crowds have yet to come in. The service and food is good. Give this place a try.

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: Cozy place to hang out with friends or family. Menu is kid friendly with good selection of pizza and pastas among other things. I had the pizza with prawns and mussels, and the tipsy wings. Both really good! Pizza is freshly made and cooked in brick oven - worth the wait. Pizza base was thin and crispy and loaded with cheese. Chicken wings were tasty and I loved the chili sauce that comes with it. Wide selection of drinks to suit everyone. I had a pint of Kirin while my wife had a frozen margarita. Loved the 80s pop music too.

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: Nice place to chill but food is subpar. Drinks are decent. Service is good and quick. We tried the lamb rack which was overcooked and the pork ribs which were hard. The chicken nachos were too salty.

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: I love the blue cheese chicken here. Ham + creamy blue cheese + chicken, the combo is great! The only reason I keep going back. Drinks selection isn't great for non alcoholics. The ambience is ok, but the cleanliness can be improved by alot. Bits of rubbish can be seen at the floor and sides, can be quite disgusting.

name: The Tipsy Cow @ Katong
address: 315 Tanjong Katong Rd, Singapore 437098
review: It was a lovely place where we listened to some golden english songs from the 80s and 90s. Overall a quiet place to relax and unwind.
